vulnerabilities.title: Credential leak in react-native-fast-image
vulnerabilities.description: This affects all versions before version 8.3.0 of package react-native-fast-image. When an image with `source={{uri: "...", headers: { host: "somehost.com", authorization: "..." }}` is loaded, all other subsequent images will use the same headers, this can lead to signing credentials or other session tokens being leaked to other servers.
